title: repurpose verb - Definition, pictures, pronunciation and usage notes | Oxford Advanced Learner's Dictionary at OxfordLearnersDictionaries.com
text: repurpose verb/ˌriːˈpɜːpəs/ /ˌriːˈpɜːrpəs/ Verb Forms - repurpose something to change something slightly in order to make it suitable for a new purpose - Content repurposed from old media is legitimate internet content. Check pronunciation: repurpose
